paper_abstract: To build a future many-core processor, industry must address the challenges of energy consumption and performance scalability. A 3D-integrated broad-purpose accelerator architecture called parallel-on-demand (POD) integrates a specialized SIMD-based die layer on top of a CISC superscalar processor to accelerate a variety of data- parallel applications. It also maintains binary compatibility and facilitates extensibility by virtualizing the acceleration capability.
